summary: A beautiful virgin inherits a castle, but when she arrives at it, she finds that the inhabitants include a strange nobleman and a bevy of beautiful women she suspects may be vampires.
cast: Anita Ekberg|Gianni Medici|Diana Lorys|Adriana Ambesi|Rosanna Yanni|Julián Ugarte|César Benet|Carlos Casaravilla|Fernando Bilbao|Paul Muller|Adriana Santucci|Aurelia Treviño|Juanita Ramírez|Keith Kendal
keywords: female vampire|sex horror|sex scene|psychotronic film|buxom woman
title: Malenka, la sobrina del vampiro
